TextView.android:text:
Welcome to eClass service for ice uniwa students.
This service is designed to inform its users as soon as possible about new announcements and assignments in the course they are enrolled in.

Every minute the server checks for new announcements and new assignments in all the courses that exist in eClass and sends a notification to the users who are enrolled in that course.
Google's Push Notification technology is used to send the notification.

A prerequisite for the correct functioning of the application is that Google Play Services is installed and working properly.
It would also be correct to remove the app from battery restriction in order to receive the notification from the server as soon as possible.
